post.author: 김세환
post.content:
We are currently looking to staff a very large project with one of the Ministries and we must find 12 Consultants who are very strong Systems Analysts/Business Analysts who have previous Canadian Government experience.

Work location will be at several MINISTRY sites within the GTA.  Start date will be Early August 2003, length of contract will be at least 3 months renewable, and rates are open based on experience.

If you are available, please send me your new resume in WORD format.  Only suitable candidates will be contacted.  

Please send resume to:

Jeff Vainio
Technical Recruiter
PROCOM
JeffV@procom.ca
post.title: Contract position 2
